subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Ohio State’s Shannon Scott and Aaron Craft are considered the nation’s best backcourt, defensively, and they displayed that in the Buckeyes’ 64-61 victory over Notre Dame.
snippet: Ohio State’s Shannon Scott and Aaron Craft are considered the nation’s best backcourt, defensively, and they displayed that in the Buckeyes’ 64-61 victory over Notre Dame.
